name: @ucfopen/materia
description: Engage students with easily embedded apps for online courses.
author: University of Central Florida, Center for Distributed Learning

scripts.devassets:link: cd ../Materia-Server-Client-Assets && yarn install && yarn link && cd - && yarn link materia-server-client-assets
scripts.devassets:unlink: yarn unlink materia-server-client-assets && cd ../Materia-Server-Client-Assets && yarn unlink && cd - && yarn install
scripts.test:php: echo 'Additional env setup needed to run on host. You probably want docker/run_tests.sh'; composer run testci
scripts.test:php:watch: nodemon -e php -i node_modules/ -i coverage/ -i docker/ -i public/widget -i fuel/vendor/ -i fuel/core/ --exec 'composer run test || exit 1'
